entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 26.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers with a few thunderstorms beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing near midnight. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
